techmeme.title: Meta is testing a feature that lets Threads users add their interests to their profile; the interests will direct users to active conversations about the topic (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Europe is in talks with SES, Viasat, and others as it rushes to provide Ukraine with alternatives to Starlink, whose service became patchy near the front line (Peggy Hollinger/Financial Times)
Apple confirms that it is delaying the "more personalized Siri" Apple Intelligence feature and anticipates rolling it out "in the coming year" (John Gruber/Daring Fireball)
Unsealed US indictment: Chinese hacking contractor i-Soon charged Chinese government customers $10K to $75K for each email inbox of US organizations it breached (Ryan Gallagher/Bloomberg)
Reflection AI, which wants to achieve superintelligence through autonomous coding agents, emerges from stealth with a $105M Series A and $25M in seed funding (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
